name: Snow Racing Car 2017 Pro
description:
Real Snow Drifting King

Enjoy ups and downs of lovely desert in heart of Dubai. Get ready for the epic drifting of your 4x4 monster luxury car.

Goal of this free game is to drift your car in desert and collect score and unlock from luxurious vehicles. You have to select among Nissan Jeera, Maclaren, Dodge Kheera, Mitsubishi Birju, Lamborgini Manthar and many more. You have to collect more and more score to unlock more cars.
